MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut affecting the SY16 SY21 postcode areas of Newtown and Welshpool, affecting properties in Manaforn, Tregynon  and surrounding area. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 1.50pm. Our engineers have arrived on site and confirmed the power cut has been caused by a fault on the overhead network. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 4pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 2.30pm on Feb 27, 2021.
